{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>11. Bey Herrn Daniel Hag dem Buchbinder sind folgende B
cher, in nachgesetztem Prei
 zu verkauffen; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Justi Lipsii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Epistolarum Centuriae complet</TITLE>, in <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> apud Plautin. 

 <PRIZE>1. Gulden 36. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Politicorum Libri</TITLE>. <TITLE>Monita</TITLE> <VOLUME>8e Exempla politica</VOLUME>. <TITLE>De Magnirudine Romana</TITLE>. <TITLE>De Constantia</TITLE>, <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> ibid. 

 <PRIZE>fl. 1. xr. 36.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>de Militia Romana cum An. fig.</TITLE> <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>-ibid. 

 <PRIZE>fl. 1. xr. 30.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Poliorecticon de Machinis, Tormentis, Telis cum An.fig.</TITLE> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> 

 <PRIZE>fl. 1. xr. 12.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>de Amphitheatro</TITLE>. <TITLE>de Amphitheatris extra Romam, cum An.fig.</TITLE> <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>-ibid. 

 <PRIZE>30. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Dissert. apud Principes Se C.Plinii Pane- Gyricus cum Commentar.</TITLE> <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>, ibid. 

 <PRIZE>48. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>C. Corn. Taciti & Velleji Paterculi</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Opera cum Lipsii Commentariis</TITLE>, gro
 <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> ibid. 

 <PRIZE>fl. 3.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Opera cum Notis Integris W. Heinsii & variorum</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <VOLUME>3. Theil</VOLUME> / <PLACE>Lugd.</PLACE> 

 <PRIZE>fl. 7. xr. 12.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Gotthard Heideggers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Kleinere Teutsche Schrifften</TITLE> / <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1732.</YEAR> 

 <PRIZE>30. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Delicia Urbis Bernae</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1732.</YEAR> 

 <PRIZE>13. 
.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. J. Scheuchzers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Vernunfft-m

ige Undersuchung des Baades zu Baaden, mit Kupfferen</TITLE>, <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1732.</YEAR> 

 <PRIZE>11.
.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. J. Scheuchzers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Vernunfft-m

ige Undersuchung des Baades zu Baaden, ohne Kupffer</TITLE>, <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1732.</YEAR> 

 <PRIZE>4. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Milton</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Verlust des Parabieses</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1732.</YEAR> 

 <PRIZE>14. 
.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Paragone della Pobsia Tragica dtalia conquella di Francia</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1732.</YEAR> 

 <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. J. Breitingeri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>in Versus obscurciss. Persii diarribe Historico Literaria</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1723.</YEAR> 

 <PRIZE>1. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Discurse der Mahleren</TITLE>, <VOLUME>4. Theil</VOLUME>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1731.</YEAR> 

 <PRIZE>16. 
.</PRIZE></BIBL> </ITEM>","number_of_corrections":6,"explanation":"The primary structural errors involved incorrect nesting of <BIBL> tags, where multiple works by the same author (Ejusd.) were listed sequentially but wrapped in nested <BIBL> tags. These were flattened into single <BIBL> entries, treating the subsequent titles as sequential works within the same listing, which is common for bound volumes in historical advertisements. Specifically: 1. In Entry 2, two opening <BIBL> tags were removed to flatten the structure. 2. In Entry 5, the nested opening <BIBL> and closing </BIBL> tags were removed, and a missing closing </BIBL> tag for the main entry was added. 3. In Entry 6, the incorrect tag <PRICE> was corrected to <PRIZE>."}

parsed.explanation: The primary structural errors involved incorrect nesting of <BIBL> tags, where multiple works by the same author (Ejusd.) were listed sequentially but wrapped in nested <BIBL> tags. These were flattened into single <BIBL> entries, treating the subsequent titles as sequential works within the same listing, which is common for bound volumes in historical advertisements. Specifically: 1. In Entry 2, two opening <BIBL> tags were removed to flatten the structure. 2. In Entry 5, the nested opening <BIBL> and closing </BIBL> tags were removed, and a missing closing </BIBL> tag for the main entry was added. 3. In Entry 6, the incorrect tag <PRICE> was corrected to <PRIZE>.
